bibl.title: The Textiles of an Early Christian Burial from el-Kom el-Ahmar / Saruna (Middle Egypt).
bibl.note: Archaeological project carried out by the Egyptological Institute of the University of Tübingen. - An unlooted burial of an old man (14C analysis: 380-560 AD).

bibl.title: Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005

bibl.seg: HUBER Béatrice, The Textiles of an Early Christian Burial from el-Kom el-Ahmar / Saruna (Middle Egypt).

Antoine DE MOOR and Cäcilia FLUCK, assisted by Susanne MARTINSSEN-VON FALCK (Edd.), Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005 (Tielt, 2007) pp. 36-69, 4 tabl., 5 figg. n./bl., 42 figg. coul., 1 carte, 1 plan.
Archaeological project carried out by the Egyptological Institute of the University of Tübingen. - An unlooted burial of an old man (14C analysis: 380-560 AD).
